name: Where are the colors
description:
WHERE ARE THE COLORS We don't know if we will give it some love and finish it. Feel free to give us any opinion or advice you want

Where are the colors is a 2D platformer shoot-em-up game developed with Unity for PaintJam2018. 

The Colorized dictatorship and their army have stolen every single color in the world of ComicLand and our hero, Bob Squirrel, found a paint weapon able to weaken, even kill them.

Join Squirrel Ross in the fight against the Colorized dictatorship!!

Mechanics

You kill enemies by draining their color with your gun, you can shoot red, blue and yellow paint. Every one of them damages enemies of that color, if an enemy is a combination of two of the colors, you'll have to shoot them with both colors.

Keyboard control:
  • A-D to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • S to crouch
  • Left, Up and Right arrow to shoot Yellow, Red and Blue respectively
XBOX360 pad control:
  • DPAD to move and crouch(left-right and down)
  • A to jump
  • X, Y, B to shoot Yellow, Red and Blue respectively
